faq.header12: Hotkeys on the Adventure Map screen:
faq.hk0: for changing battle type by default.
faq.hk1: for opening of the new settings menu.
faq.hk10: click on a hero or creature to instantly upgrade creatures.
faq.hk11: on a creature with the Warlord's Banner to quickly transfer it to the hero.
faq.hk2: on the map to display the remaining movement points of the selected hero.
faq.hk3: on a monolith to display the already detected entrance/exit of this monolith.
faq.hk4: during the battle for its instant end.
faq.hk5: on the creature for displaying advanced battle info.
faq.hk6: make all your troops {wait} until the end of the round.
faq.hk7: make all your troops {defence} until the end of the round.
faq.hk8: to open the hero meeting screen.
faq.hk9: to open a menu of additional functions.

settings.opt1:
{CONTROLLED BATTLE ACTIONS}

[author: daemon_n] (gem_settings.erm)

If that option is enabled, you will control your creatures actions after enemie units actions by pressing {ALT} {+} {W} or {ALT} {+} {D/Space}.

This option is enabled by default and saved when you switch it.
settings.opt1+:
ATTENTION!
 Since the "BattleSave" plugin is enabled, BattleSave will be performed through the plugin, and the script is forcibly disabled.
settings.opt2:
{~>m_manualF.def} {~>m_automf.def} {NEW INTERFACE BUTTONS} {~>m_autowm.def} {~>m_choiceB.def}

[author: daemon_n, totkotoriy]

Buttons change types of quick battle, message disabling and mithril display.

Switching quick battle mode is also available with the key"W".

{ADVENTURE MAP OBJECT HINTS}

[author: daemon_n] (plugin - GameplayEnhancementsPlugin.era)

The plugin displays hints on some objects when the "ALT" key is pressed

You can change the list of objects and the hotkey for working in the "{/Runtime/gem_AdventureMapHints.ini}" file.
